summary: Doctor Watson moves in with the eccentric Sherlock Holmes and they get a case to solve. A young heiress seeks Holmes' help when she feels threatened by her brutish stepfather after her sister dies under mysterious circumstances.
cast: Vasiliy Livanov|Vitali Solomin|Rina Zelyonaya|Igor Efimov|Gennadiy Bogachyov|Borislav Brondukov|Igor Dmitriev|Mariya Solomina|Nikolay Karachentsov|Fyodor Odinokov|Adolf Ilin|Viktor Aristov|Oleg Khromenkov|Lyubov Tishchenko|Vitali Baganov|Boris Livanov Jr.|Yakov Naishuler|Aleksey Shato-Ba|Igor Okrepilov|Mikhail Vorobyov|Catherine Schell
